pullrequest.title: Fix observation files being temporarly and securely created in segway task

content.raw: What exceptions should be captured when attempting to delete files and what should be done in these cases? I can only think of the case where if the file doesn’t exist \(and the exception is raised\), to simply ignore it. I’d assume all other exceptions are exceptional should be allowed to raise.
content.html: What exceptions should be captured when attempting to delete files and what should be done in these cases? I can only think of the case where if the file doesn’t exist (and the exception is raised), to simply ignore it. I’d assume all other exceptions are exceptional should be allowed to raise.
